page.title: 07The Community Centre Newent
page.content:
The{Newent Centre}is situated on the outskirts of Newent at the junction of Ross Road and High Street and is housed in buildings that were once a workhouse for the poor and more recently Newent Grammar School.
Today the buildings are used for adult education, as a youth club and as a meeting place for some of the approximately 50 clubs and societies that flourish in Newent today.
Recently the{Town Council}has had to vacate its rooms in the Forest of Dean District Council Offices in the High Street and is now housed in the Centre. Here members of the public can view local planning applications and can voice an opinion through their elected representatives about the quality of life in Newent.
